name: Defense Of The Horde
description:
On the night the shards fell from the heavens, the blight spread amongst all Orcs weak of will. Its effects were irreversible. Now only a select few of indomitable Orcs remain untainted. In your hands lies the last defence of the horde.

Controls

Select towers to build at the top left corner. Towers can only be built on the highlighted areas of the map. 

Current Build

  • Currently one playable level (more to come in the coming weeks)
  • Looking for feedback and general feel of the game.
  • There are currently two types of Towers.
    • The Archer - Your main defence against the tainted orcs.
      The Drummer - Your way of generating resource.
